title: Michael Jackson's Thriller. The Making of Thriller
brief_description: This video contains the short musical production of Michael Jackson’s “Thriller” and a behind-the-scenes documentary of the making of “Thriller” including interviews, excerpts from the music video “Beat it” and feature film “Werewolf in London”, and archival home movie footage of Michael in action as a member of his family group the Jackson Five. “Thriller” also stars Ola Ray and features a “rap” by Vincent Price.
